column4: huh... room.. i felt what i think is a homely feeling... i m just coming from #fedora
and when u find that other IRC like #fedora wont answer ur queries but rather discourage a newbie... u come to know the real value of #ubuntu and why ubuntu is so home
this room has maintained far more friendly environment than any other room...
That literally just happened to me. But someone here helped me with my knoppix install
